item.title: The Mark Christopher Show Music & Politics 8
item.description: Another thirty plus minutes of all original songs by Mark Christopher, themes of God, Love, Politics, and Freedom. A "Day In The Life", so to speak. Listen for the newest song, "What Can I Do, What Could I Say", a rockin' country song that is sure to please. Taking the "one man band" concept to a new level.....
item.dc:creator: Mark Christopher
item.itunes:summary: Another thirty plus minutes of all original songs by Mark Christopher, themes of God, Love, Politics, and Freedom. A "Day In The Life", so to speak. Listen for the newest song, "What Can I Do, What Could I Say", a rockin' country song that is sure to please. Taking the "one man band" concept to a new level.....

item.title: The Mark Christopher Show Music & Politics 7
item.description: Forty plus minutes of all new music from a "Day In The Life" of Mark Christopher, Singer/Songwriter/Performer with the DESERT SON BAND in Fort Worth, Texas. Mark debuts his Country song "The Ballad Of Blue Thunder", a song about the many perils of the Trucking Industry, and seven other songs written and recorded in the last couple of months. Patriotism, Love, Friendship, God, Country, and upholding our original Constitution are the main themes to his songs.
item.dc:creator: Mark Christopher
item.itunes:summary: Forty plus minutes of all new music from a "Day In The Life" of Mark Christopher, Singer/Songwriter/Performer with the DESERT SON BAND in Fort Worth, Texas. Patriotism, Love, Friendship, God, Country, and upholding our original Constitution are the main themes to his songs.

item.title: The Mark Christopher Show Music & Politics 6
item.description: Forty minutes of Anti-Porkulus spending, Tea Party Revolution demonstrating, fight for the Right attesting Music and Dialogue. From the founder of the movement "Tea Party '09", Mark Christopher. Plus, a national broadcast interview with the "Rusty Humphries Show" with yours truly. The best show yet, with seven new songs about God, Love, Honor, Freedom, and America. We won't let them shred our Constitution.....
item.dc:creator: Mark Christopher
item.itunes:summary: Forty minutes of Anti-Porkulus spending, Tea Party Revolution demonstrating, fight for the Right attesting Music and Dialogue. From the founder of the movement "Tea Party '09", Mark Christopher. Plus, a national broadcast interview with the "Rusty Humphries Show" with yours truly. The best show yet, with seven new songs about God, Love, Honor, Freedom, and America. We won't let them shred our Constitution.....

item.title: The Mark Christopher Show Music And Politics 5
item.description: Six great new songs by Mark Christopher, a little insight into their meaning, and a whole lot of post-election fun.... Whoooopa!!
item.dc:creator: Mark Christopher
item.itunes:summary: Six great new songs by Mark Christopher, a little insight into their meaning, and a whole lot of post-election fun.... Whoooopa!!

item.title: The Mark Christopher Show Music And Politics 4
item.description: It's been a couple weeks... I have some new material for you, "Down In Houston", a song about the recent disaster. Some other new stuff and the usual smattering of political intrigue. A little Zydeco, a little Folk Rock.... and material by Desert Son, and others
item.dc:creator: Mark Christopher
item.itunes:summary: It's been a couple weeks... I have some new material for you, "Down In Houston", a song about the recent disaster. Some other new stuff and the usual smattering of political intrigue. A little Zydeco, a little Folk Rock.... and material by Desert Son, and others

item.title: The Mark Christopher Show Music And Politics 3
item.description: Another five of the best songs that have influenced my music and my newest song, "Can You Relate In 2008", about my amazement at the political process. A pleasant "oh, well" type of song kind of relating to Palin, our newest hero. Fun stuff...
item.dc:creator: Mark Christopher
item.itunes:summary: Another five of the best songs that have influenced my music and my newest song, "Can You Relate In 2008", about my amazement at the political process. A pleasant "oh, well" type of song kind of relating to Palin, our newest hero. Fun stuff...

item.title: The Mark Christopher Show Music And Politics 2
item.description: Actually more music than politics.... I just get a little political lyrically... But if you like mellow folk rock with alot of 3 part harmonies.... this is it. This week is a blend of my originals and some from other artists that have influenced my style. Niiiice....
item.dc:creator: Mark Christopher
item.itunes:summary: Actually more music than politics.... I just get a little political lyrically... But if you like mellow folk rock with alot of 3 part harmonies.... this is it. This week is a blend of my originals and some from other artists that have influenced my style. Niiiice....

item.title: The Mark Christopher Show Music and Politics
item.description: Mark Christopher is a Musician/Singer/Songwriter that expresses his opinion by way of music, concentrating on the modern issues and themes of God, Love, and Country. Sit in awhile, and listen to some cool tunes, and rant about a couple of American Issues, and Freedom.
item.dc:creator: Mark Christopher
item.itunes:summary: Mark Christopher is a Musician/Singer/Songwriter that expresses his opinion by way of music, concentrating on the modern issues and themes of God, Love, and Country. Sit in awhile, and listen to some cool tunes, and rant about a couple of American Issues, and Freedom.

item.title: The Mark Christopher Show 12
item.description: Solo artist Mark Christopher is a singer/songwriter on a mission to write music with a purpose and message, well most of it, anyway........... Show 12 is full of new material. The best show yet...
item.dc:creator: Mark Christopher
item.itunes:summary: Solo artist Mark Christopher is a singer/songwriter on a mission to write music with a purpose and message, well most of it, anyway........... Show 12 is full of new material. The best show yet...
